components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Nigeria and Benin

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN Network in Nigeria and Benin. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN Network in Nigeria and Benin. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to MTN in Guinea-Bissau

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery to MTN in Guinea-Bissau.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance (Optus)

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct a planned maintenance on our circuits with Optus in the Australia Twilio network from 26 May 2025 at 08:00 PDT until 26 May 2025 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls via the Optus network in Australia.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - PSTN
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC
ELASTIC SIP TRUNKING - Origination

During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on Interconnect services via the Optus network in Australia.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Hosted SMS - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned maintenance in US & Canada between 16:00 and 20:00 Pacific Time on 05/29/2025. During the maintenance window, if a hosted number is released, there might be some delays in removing it from the associated messaging service, but not any effect in traffic. We recommend users not to create or update hosted numbers in that window but if they do, they can retry if they experience any errors.

affected_components.name: PHONE NUMBERS

scheduled_maintenances.name: Iraq SMS Carrier Maintenance - Multiple Networks

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Multiple Networks in Iraq are conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 03 June 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to multiple networks Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 21 May 2025 at 22:00 PDT
23 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 23 May 2025 at 22:00 PDT
25 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 25 May 2025 at 22:00 PDT
27 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 27 May 2025 at 22:00 PDT
30 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 30 May 2025 at 22:00 PDT
01 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 01 June 2025 at 22:00 PDT
03 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 03 June 2025 at 22:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC
